item.title: Smart Sand Inc 10-K
item.description: Smart Sand Inc, which is in the Mining, Quarrying Of Nonmetallic Minerals (No Fuels) [1400] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 08, 2022 had 35548 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: sand - 466 instances 31 - 277 instances december - 275 instances company - 270 instances operations - 267 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
